dcterms:creator: L. J. Manso
P. Nuez
L. V. Calderita
D. R. Faria
P. Bachiller
dcterms:description: The SocNav1 dataset provides social compliance labels for specific scenarios involving a robot, objects, and people interacting. It contains 16,336 labelled samples for training, 556 scenarios for development, and an additional 556 for testing, with labels indicating the extent to which the robot is considered disturbing to the people in the scenario.
dcterms:title: SocNav1
